issues.info: If something isn't turning out to be as funny as we thought, please report it to the repository!

safe-mode.name: Safe Mode
safe-mode.description: Prevent any progression made in levels. <cr>Highly recommended that this is kept enabled!</cr>

grief-chance.name: Grief Chance
grief-chance.description: <cj>Get Back on Grief</c> - Chance of your level switching to Grief.

congregation-chance.name: Congregation Chance
congregation-chance.description: <cj>Congregation Jumpscare</c> - Chance of your level switching to Congregation.

mock-chance.name: Mock Chance
mock-chance.description: <cj>Mock your 90%+ Fail</c> - Chance of your fail being shown on screen.

achieve-chance.name: Achievement Sound Chance
achieve-chance.description: <cj>Random Achievements</c> - Chance of the achievement sound playing.

crash_death-chance.name: Crash Chance
crash_death-chance.description: <cj>Crash Chance on Death</c> - Chance of your crashing when dying in a level.

math_quiz-chance.name: Math Quiz Chance
math_quiz-chance.description: <cj>Richard's Math Quiz!</c> - Chance of Richard's math quiz appearing.

no_jump-chance.name: No Jump Chance
no_jump-chance.description: <cj>Randomly Don't Jump</c> - Chance of your jump input not registering.

upside_down-chance.name: Upside-Down Scene Chance
upside_down-chance.description: <cj>Upside-Down Chance</c> - Chance of your game's UI turning upside_down.
